com.salesforce.androidsdk.config

Class BootConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.config.BootConfig

  • public class BootConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Class encapsulating the application configuration (consumer key, oauth scopes, refresh behavior).
    Author:
    wmathurin

      • isLocal

        public boolean isLocal()
        Returns if the start page is local or a VF page.
        Returns:
        True - if start page is in assets/www, False - if it's a VF page.

        Returns:
        URL of the unauthenticated start page.

      • isAbsoluteUrl

        public static boolean isAbsoluteUrl(java.lang.String urlString)
        Convenience method to determine whether a configured startPage value is an absolute URL.
        Returns:
        true if startPage is an absolute URL, false otherwise.

      • getErrorPage

        public java.lang.String getErrorPage()
        Returns the path to the local error page.
        Returns:

      • shouldAuthenticate

        public boolean shouldAuthenticate()
        Returns whether the app should go through login flow the first time or not.
        Returns:
        True - if the app should go through login flow, False - otherwise.

      • attemptOfflineLoad

        public boolean attemptOfflineLoad()
        Returns whether the app should attempt to load cached content when offline.
        Returns:
        True - if the app should attempt to load cached content, False - otherwise.
